model

Class Week

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Week
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Week
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Week(int weekNum)
      This is the constructor method for the Week object, and it takes in a weekNum (int version of the day of the week).
      Week(int weekNum, Day[] days)
      This constructor takes in the weekNum plus an array of Day objects that we can set as the Week's days

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Day getDay(int dayNum)
      This method takes in a dayNum which is the day of the week and returns the Day object at the week's Day for that int
      Day[] getDays()
      This method returns the array of Day objects for the week
      void setDay(int dayNum, Day day)
      This method sets the Week's day of the week to the inputed Day
      void setDays(Day[] days)
      This method sets the Day array of the Week to the inputed Day array

    • Constructor Detail

      • Week

        public Week(int weekNum)
        This is the constructor method for the Week object, and it takes in a weekNum (int version of the day of the week).
        Parameters:
        weekNum - The int day of the week This just takes in the int weekNum and sets the weekNum field, then creates the array of Day objects for the week.

      • Week

        public Week(int weekNum,
            Day[] days)
        This constructor takes in the weekNum plus an array of Day objects that we can set as the Week's days
        Parameters:
        weekNum - The day of the week int
        days - The array of Days to set as the week's Days This method sets the Week's fields to the passed in objects

    • Method Detail

      • setDay

        public void setDay(int dayNum,
                   Day day)
        This method sets the Week's day of the week to the inputed Day
        Parameters:
        dayNum - The day of the week to put the Day into
        day - The Day object to place into the week This method puts the Day object into the Week Day array by subtracting one from the dayNum to get the 0 inclusive index

      • setDays

        public void setDays(Day[] days)
        This method sets the Day array of the Week to the inputed Day array
        Parameters:
        days - The array of days Simple setter that does exactly what it says

      • getDay

        public Day getDay(int dayNum)
        This method takes in a dayNum which is the day of the week and returns the Day object at the week's Day for that int
        Parameters:
        dayNum - The day of the week int at which to grab the Day object
        Returns:
        Day the day object The method subtracts by one to convert from the "human" indexing of the week to the array's indexing and grabs the Day; if the day int doesn't exist, returns null

      • getDays

        public Day[] getDays()
        This method returns the array of Day objects for the week
        Returns:
        Day[] the array of days Simple getter that does exactly what it says
